inclusion.criterion: willing and able to complete the requirements of this study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to complete the study in 5 working days or less
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to perform pulmonary function tests
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pulmonary function tests within the normal range
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: documented clinical diagnosis of moderate or severe persistent asthma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: stable asthma in the 4 weeks prior to selection
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: obese subject/patient having a Body Mass Index (BMI) > 35
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: past or present respiratory disease including being free from the common cold and rhinitis for at least 4 weeks before selection except asthma for asthmatic patients and COPD for COPD patients
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
